about_the_game:
Welcome to "VTuber Manager" – Where You Craft Your Own Virtual Empire!

In this innovative simulation game, you'll step into the role of a VTuber studio manager, navigating through the endless possibilities of the virtual world. Your mission is to discover and develop top-notch VTubers and a professional team, creating a renowned studio in the realm of virtual entertainment.

Explore a world of diverse gameplay

Scouting and Development: Choose and nurture potential talents and staff from a roster of over a hundred unique VTubers, customizing distinctive virtual personas and styles for them.

Creative Production: Design and sell a variety of VTuber merchandise, ranging from adorable plushies to trendy apparel, captivating fans from all corners.

Content Creation: Produce engaging live stream highlights and execute well-planned promotional campaigns to enhance the online presence of your VTubers.

Interaction and Challenges: Encounter dozens of different event dialogues in-game, where each decision can pivot the direction of your VTuber career.

Multiple Endings: Every choice matters with multiple ending scenarios, ensuring each playthrough remains fresh and challenging.

"VTuber Manager" is more than just a game; it's a world filled with creativity and strategy. Your decisions shape the destiny of your VTubers and their fan communities. Are you ready? Let's embark on a journey to script your legendary story in this enchanting virtual world!

short_description: Embark on a management odyssey with 'VTuber Manager', a sim game where you build a virtual entertainment empire. Scout talents, customize avatars, produce content, and make strategic choices to lead your VTubers to stardom!
